about_the_game:
Hullbreaker is a multiplayer action roguelike that combines naval warfare with deckbuilding roguelike elements. Customize your ship with different weapons to forge your own vessel to take on other players by clashing on the high seas.

MIX-AND-MATCH DIFFERENT UPGRADE COMBINATIONS!

Apply weapons to your ship, such as cannons, mortars, trap barrels. With upgrades able to boost stats and give unique effects to each one the possibilities are endless for customization.

BECOME THE PIRATE KING

Utilize your ship to the fullest extent to best other captains. Create unique strategies with your ship and plan out how to counter your foes.

DYNAMIC ENVIROMENT

The sea is vast and ever-changing, ensuring that each battle is a unique experience. Experience a dynamic realistic ocean simulation, weighty ships, day and night cycle, and weather that changes each round.

CREATE YOUR OWN FLAG!

Fly your flag with pride! Aided by a custom drawing editor that takes your very own design and applies it to your ship in game.
detailed_description:
Roadmap

I am looking to add more features to Hullbreaker to enhance the gameplay experience and flesh out more visual content. Here is some of the big additions coming up!

  • New Weapons - A ship is nothing without its supply of armaments, some planned weapon types are Greek Fire, Harpoons, different Cannon types, and Skeleton Row Boat Minions! 

  • More Upgrades - Updates and changes to the upgrade system with upgrades containing both new weapon types and additions to already implemented weapons.

  • Weather Improvements - Weather will have more of an impact on gameplay and sailing mechanics. It will create new hazards such as whirlpools, create a thick fog that lowers visibility, and create harsher conditions for combat!

  • Map Additions - Different locations to battle it out with treacherous new hazards. As of right now the volcano is the next planned addition.

  • Visual/Audio Enhancements - Improvements to the look and feel of ships and combat to create an even greater intense experience on the high seas.

Already implemented features present in Hullbreaker.

  • Matchmaking system for both private and public lobbies with support up to 4 players!

  • Flag customization

  • Roundshot, Grapeshot, and Chainshot Cannons

  • Mortar

  • Ram

  • Trap Barrels

  • Weather

  • Liars Dice

  • And over 40 upgrades to choose from!

short_description: A fusion of arena PvP combat on the high seas and roguelite mechanics. Outfit your ship with powerful weapons, clash with rival captains on the high seas, and create your own flag to hoist over the shipwrecks!
